(2010) | Next album = ''[[Thousand Mile Stare]]'' (2011) | Misc = {{Singles | Name = Giants | Type = studio | single 1 = [[Hiding All the Stars]] | single 1 date = 18 October 2009 | single 2 = [[Come Back (Chicane song)|Come Back]] | single 2 date = 25 April 2010 | single 3 = [[Middledistancerunner]] | single 3 date = 2 August 2010 | single 4 = [[Chicane - Where Do I Start|Where Do I Start]] | single 4 date = 14 November 2010 }} }} {{Album ratings |rev1 = [[Allmusic]] |rev1Score = {{rating|4|5}} http://www.allmusic.com/album/giants-r1952590/review |rev2 = [[Play.com]] |rev2Score = {{rating|5|5}} http://www.play.com/Music/CD/4-/15784624/Giants/Product.html |rev3 = [[hmv.com]] |rev3Score = {{rating|5|5}} http://hmv.com/hmvweb/displayProductDetails.do?sku=779882 |rev4 = [[Amazon.com]] |rev4Score = {{rating|4.5|5}} http://www.amazon.com/dp/B003G2GP9Y |rev5 = [[Amazon.co.uk]] |rev5Score = {{rating|4.5|5}} http://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B003G2GP9Y }} '''''Giants''''' is the fourth studio album by British electronic dance music artist [[Chicane (recording artist)|Chicane]]. It was released in the United Kingdom on 2 August 2010. The album's first official single, "[[Middledistancerunner]]", featuring the vocals of [[Adam Young]] was released on the same day. The songs "[[Poppiholla]]", "[[Hiding All the Stars]]" and "[[Come Back (Chicane song)|Come Back]]", which were supposed be released on a ''Re-work'' EP back in 2009, are also included on the album. The album debuted at number thirty-five on the [[UK Albums Chart]] and at number two on the UK Dance Albums Chart on 8 August 2010. ==Track listing== {{tracklist | writing_credits = yes | title1 = Barefoot | writer1 = Bracegirdle, Hockley | length1 = 6:04 | title2 = [[Middledistancerunner]] | writer2 = Bracegirdle, Hockley | length2 = 5:52 | title3 = [[Come Back (Chicane song)|Come Back]] | writer3 = [[Jack Lee (musician)|Jack Lee]] | length3 = 7:28 | title4 = What Am I Doing Here? (Part 1) | writer4 = Bracegirdle, Hockley, Nigel Butler, Ray Hedges | length4 = 3:45 | title5 = Giants | writer5 = Bracegirdle, Hockley | length5 = 7:01 | title6 = [[Poppiholla]] (5am) | writer6 = [[Georg HÃ³lm]], [[JÃ³n ÃÃ³r Birgisson]], [[Kjartan Sveinsson]], [[Orri PÃ¡ll DÃ½rason]] | length6 = 5:06 | title7 = So Far Out to Sea | writer7 = Bracegirdle, Hockley | length7 = 5:37 | title8 = Where Do I Start? | writer8 = Bracegirdle, Hockley, Hedges | length8 = 4:31 | title9 = From Where I Stand | writer9 = Bracegirdle, Hockley, Butler, Hedges | length9 = 6:38 | title10 = [[Hiding All the Stars]] | writer10 = Bracegirdle, Hockley, [[Gary Numan]] | length10 = 5:43 | title11 = What Am I Doing Here (Part 2) | writer11 = Bracegirdle, Hockley, Butler, Hedges | length11 = 6:26 | title12 = Titles | writer12 = Bracegirdle, Hockley | length12 = 4:26 }} {{tracklist | headline = CD bonus track | writing_credits = yes | title13 = Middledistancerunner | note13 = [[Disco Citizens|DC]] Rework Edit | writer13 = Bracegirdle, Hockley | length13 = 3:53 }} ==Personnel== *[[Adam Young]] â vocals on "[[Middledistancerunner]]" *[[Paul Young (singer and guitarist)|Paul Young]] â vocals on "Come Back" *Blandine â vocals on "What Am I Doing Here (Part 1)" and "Where Do I Start" *Tracy Ackerman â vocals on "So Far Out to Sea" *Lucie Kay â vocals on "From Where I Stand" *Kerry â additional vocals on "From Where I Stand" *Natasha Andrews â vocals on "[[Hiding All the Stars]]" *[[Lemar]] â vocals on "What Am I Doing Here (Part 2)" ==Charts== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (2010) !Peak
